design_philosophy.core_concept: Visualizing sound and connection through deep contrast and fluid motion.

headings.usage: Main headlines, Section titles. Use for 'Soccial Symphony' branding to evoke elegance.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, Buttons. Clean and modern to balance the serif headings.

mono.usage: Tiny labels, decorative numbers, technical details.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold px-8 py-3 rounded-full hover:scale-105 transition-transform shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(245,158,11,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-full hover:bg-white/10 transition-colors

cards.glass: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/10 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-white focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-white/30

hero.description: Full screen height. Centered content. 'Soccial Symphony' in large Playfair Display. Subtext in Manrope. Background should be deep black with a subtle 'Gold' glow or soundwave effect.

about.description: Two column layout. Left: Text (Founders info). Right: Abstract visual or Founders photo (if provided, else placeholder).
about.content: Co-founded by Neeraj Vaid and Pijush Singha.

short_videos.style: Phone-aspect ratio cards (9:16). Horizontal scroll. Snap-to-center. Glassmorphism overlay for titles.

long_videos.style: 16:9 Aspect ratio embeds. 2 or 3 columns. Rounded corners. Hover glow effect.

testimonials.style: Horizontal scrolling cards or Grid. 5 Star icons (Phosphor Icons 'Star' weight='fill'). Quote marks.

enquiry.style: Minimalist form on a glass card. Centered.

admin_dashboard.auth: Simple password check (hardcoded or env for MVP)
admin_dashboard.style: Clean, functional, tabular data. Use Shadcn Table and Dialog components.

universal_guidelines: Use 'framer-motion' for all entrance animations (FadeIn, SlideUp).
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states (brightness-110 or scale-105).
Use 'sonner' for form submission success/error toasts.
Do not use default scrollbars. Use 'tailwind-scrollbar' or custom CSS to hide/style them.
Ensure mobile responsiveness. Stack grids to 1 column on mobile.
